title: Pair of Leggings, from a three-piece costume
description: three geometric design motifs on each; beaded overall with light blue beaded background; blue cotton edging; pink floral printed fabric on back; six ties on each
creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
